Container.Name: mail-archiver
Container.Overview: Mail Archiver is a web-based solution for archiving, searching, and exporting emails. All emails and attachments are stored in a Postgresql database.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Web interface port

Config.Name: Folder for Data Protection Keys
Config.Description: Folder for storing data protection keys

Config.Name: Database Connection String
Config.Description: PostgreSQL connection string. Format: Host=hostname;Port=5432;Database=dbname;Username=user;Password=pass; Replace 'postgres' with your PostgreSQL IP address (on bridge network) or container name (on custom network) and update credentials as needed.

Config.Name: Authentication Enabled
Config.Description: Whether to enable authentication (true/false). Set to true to require login.

Config.Name: Admin Username
Config.Description: The username for the admin account.

Config.Name: Admin Password
Config.Description: The password for the admin account.

Config.Name: Session Timeout (Minutes)
Config.Description: The session timeout in minutes.

Config.Name: Cookie Name
Config.Description: The name of the authentication cookie.

Config.Name: Mail Sync Interval (Minutes)
Config.Description: The interval in minutes between email synchronization.

Config.Name: Mail Sync Timeout (Minutes)
Config.Description: The timeout for the sync operation in minutes.

Config.Name: Connection Timeout (Seconds)
Config.Description: The connection timeout for IMAP connections in seconds.

Config.Name: Command Timeout (Seconds)
Config.Description: The command timeout for IMAP commands in seconds.

Config.Name: Always Force Full Sync
Config.Description: Whether to always force a full sync (true/false).

Config.Name: Ignore Self-Signed Certificates
Config.Description: Whether to ignore self-signed certificates (true/false).

Config.Name: Batch Restore Async Threshold
Config.Description: The number of emails that triggers async processing.

Config.Name: Max Sync Emails
Config.Description: The maximum number of emails for sync processing.

Config.Name: Max Async Emails
Config.Description: The maximum number of emails for async processing.

Config.Name: Batch Restore Session Timeout (Minutes)
Config.Description: The session timeout for batch restore in minutes.

Config.Name: Default Batch Size
Config.Description: The default batch size for email operations.

Config.Name: Batch Operation Size
Config.Description: The batch size for email operations.

Config.Name: Pause Between Emails (ms)
Config.Description: The pause between individual emails in milliseconds.

Config.Name: Pause Between Batches (ms)
Config.Description: The pause between batches in milliseconds.

Config.Name: Max Selectable Emails
Config.Description: The maximum number of emails that can be selected at once.

Config.Name: Database Command Timeout
Config.Description: The timeout for database commands in seconds.

Config.Name: Max Upload File Size (GB)
Config.Description: The maximum file size for uploads in GB.

Config.Name: Upload Keep Alive Timeout (Hours)
Config.Description: The keep alive timeout for uploads in hours.

Config.Name: Upload Request Headers Timeout (Hours)
Config.Description: The timeout for request headers in hours.

Config.Name: Display Time Zone
Config.Description: The time zone used for displaying email timestamps in the UI. Use any TZ identifier from: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones
